name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior System Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering robust applications, focusing on cloud technologies and performance optimizations. Proficient in **AWS** and **Azure** for deploying cloud-native systems, alongside expertise in **CI/CD**, **DevOps**, and **API** integrations utilizing **gRPC** and **ReST** protocols. Skilled in implementing **Kubernetes**, **GitOps**, and monitoring solutions to enhance system performance and security.
Demonstrated ability to build scalable architectures, including experience with microservices and event-driven systems leveraging **gRPC** and **OpenFlow** technologies. Background in compliance-driven development ensures alignment with industry standards. Original strengths include versatility in programming languages using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, and advanced backend frameworks such as **Node.js**, **Django**, and **FastAPI**. Adept at constructing AI/ML-powered platforms to support analytics and real-time processing, while also well-versed in MLOps using **MLflow**, **Airflow** and **Kubeflow**.
